title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama at the Situation Room meeting on the evacuation of Nigerians from Sudan

content.rendered: The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, Geoffrey Oyeama and the Hon. Minister, of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management and Social Development, Sadiya Umar Farouq participated in the Situation Room meeting on the evacuation of Nigerians from Sudan held on Friday, 28th April, 2023. Present at the meeting, was the Permanent Secretary, FMHADMSD, Dr. Nasir Sani- Gwarzo, mni, NPOM among other Senior Government Officials
